page.title: 14Bosco Youth Centre
page.content: { The centre takes its name from St. {Don Bosco. Over the years the building has had many uses.Originally it was used as{"reading rooms"}in which men would read their Sunday newspapers; then{a school,}followed by a {playschool & youth centre.}Situated on {Chapel St.}it is positioned between {the Chapel & Our Lady's H.Sch.(pic 4) The Centre, with{200 members, caters for{boys & girls aged 10 to 21. The club tries to cater for the{many {interests}of young people,& provides a place where they can relax & talk. The inside has been recently decorated. The club is{open 5 nights weekly. The{full time youth leader}is{Mr. {Peter Cush.}During this coming year the club{members intend}renovating 2 rooms making it larger & more comfortable.
